name: NSFontDescriptor.TraitKey
desc: Constants that can be used as keys to retrieve information about a font descriptor from its trait dictionary.

items.name: static let symbolic: NSFontDescriptor.TraitKey
items.desc: The symbolic traits value as a number object.

items.name: static let weight: NSFontDescriptor.TraitKey
items.desc: The normalized weight value as a number object.

items.name: static let width: NSFontDescriptor.TraitKey
items.desc: The relative inter-glyph spacing value as a number object.

items.name: static let slant: NSFontDescriptor.TraitKey
items.desc: The relative slant angle value as a number object.
